flashcards.notes: Versatile particle meaning: them/they, any, wherever, whenever, even, however, just like, suddenly. Context determines specific meaning.
examples: O kûrîa maikagia maitho (Wherever they looked)
Mûndû o wothe (any person; every person)
O na kûrî o ûgûo (however; nevertheless)
O na ndangîetîkîrîre (He/she would even not have agreed)
O ta mûndû (just like a person)
O na ndirarîrîkana (I don't even remember)

flashcards.kikuyu: Monosyllable words: Ha, He, Ke, Ma, Nda, Nja, No, O, Ta
flashcards.english: Nine essential monosyllables with distinct meanings
flashcards.notes: Core monosyllables: Ha (where - opposite of Haha=here), He (give me), Ke (take/receive), Ma (true/truth), Nda (stomach/pregnancy), Nja (outside), No (but), O (them/even), Ta (like/resembling)
